## Réimportation des données


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
 data <-  read.csv(file = "data/raw/athlete_events.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
skim(data)
```

## Données extrêmes


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p1 <- ggplot(data,
       aes(Age))

p1 + geom_histogram(color = "black",
                    fill = "#facade",
                    binwidth = 1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 9474 rows containing non-finite values (stat_bin).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](exploration_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
data %>% filter(Age > 78) %>% 
    select(Name, Sex,Team, Games, Sport, Age)
```

## Age vs Sex


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p2 <- ggplot(data,
             aes(Sex, Age))+
    geom_boxplot()

p2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 9474 rows containing non-finite values (stat_boxplot).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](exploration_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Évolution du ratio Homme / Femme


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
evolution <- data %>% 
    group_by(Year, Sex) %>% 
    summarise(n = n()) %>% 
    mutate(ratio = n / sum(n) * 100) %>% 
    ungroup()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Year'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
evolution_f <- evolution %>% filter(Sex == "F")
evolution_h <- evolution %>% filter(Sex == "M")

ggplot(evolution,
       aes(Year, ratio, color = Sex))+
    geom_line()+
    geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](exploration_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(evolution_f,
       aes(Year, ratio))+
    geom_line()+
    geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](exploration_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(evolution_h,
       aes(Year, ratio))+
    geom_line()+
    geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](exploration_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::
